lil.la: Felix de Corduba; cum eo, i.a., Liliosa
lil.en: Felix of Cordoba; with him, i.a., Liliosa
lil.pl: Feliks z Kordoby; z nim, m.in., Lilioza

phi.la: Felix; cum eo, i.a., Philippus; tamquam Septem Fratres
phi.en: Felix; with him, i.a., Philip; as Seven Brothers
phi.pl: Feliks; z nim, m.in., Filip; jako Siedmiu Braci
